title: U.S. News: Comcast, Goldman Resume PAC Giving
text:
At that time, Comcast announced it would suspend donations to the election objectors. Goldman Sachs had said it would stop all political giving as it reviewed its donation criteria.

Representatives for Comcast didn't respond to emails seeking comment. A representative for Goldman Sachs declined to comment.

The Wall Street Journal has reported more than a dozen other corporate and industry PACs that paused political giving or announced reviews had restarted donations, including to objectors, earlier this year.

Several other companies have stuck to their pledges to halt PAC giving to objectors or have chosen to stop political giving altogether.
